about_the_game:
Skeleboy is an bone breaking action packed roguelite inspired by the classic arcade game Breakout. Take control of a small skeleton boy on a weird journey through Hell to rescue a dead princess and defeat the sinister warlock Hex la Mort.

From the creator of games such as Atom☭grad, Palm Cracker, 128k and After Hours!

Paint your skulls!!!

Experiment with different paintings to find unique and explosive combinations! There's probably a billion different combinations of upgrades! Build the skulls that fit your needs, to make your way all through Hell. 

Challenging Gameplay!!!

Shatter obstacles and enemies with skulls that cleave through the depths of Hell. Each level is procedurally generated, filled with weird hellish enemies, cool items, and hidden passages. Hell is a cool place, make sure to reach the bottom!

Every Run is Unique!!!

Each playthrough offers new opportunities and challenges. Unlock new abilities to increase your chances against the sorcerer Hex la Mort. The only game you'll ever need!

What Skeleboy can offer YOU!!!

  • A roguelite experience with a Breakout-inspired mechanic. 

  • Befriend every boss and populate the town!

  • Hell is a big place, you know. Dynamic, procedurally generated worlds, with carefully constructed levels for unlimited replayability!

  • Gather tattoos and paint your skulls to create your perfect combinations! Experiment to find your fit!

  • The game will make your dreams come true!

  • A gripping story that will make you cry.

  • Over 400 hours of gameplay!

  • So many secrets and unlockables!

  • Enough achievements to make your mom proud.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Skeleboy is a Breakout-like action Rogue-lite game. Guide Skeleboy though Hell, upgrade his skulls to perfection and save the bones of the dead Princess! Be the Skeleboy you always wanted to be.
